howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Get started with AI-powered interview prep in just three simple steps

step1.title: Set Your Profile
step1.description: Tell us about your target role, experience level, and areas you want to focus on. Our AI will personalize everything for you.

step2.title: AI Generates Questions
step2.description: Our advanced AI creates unlimited, relevant interview questions tailored specifically to your profile and goals.

step3.title: Practice & Learn
step3.description: Answer questions, get detailed explanations, and track your progress. Improve continuously with AI-powered insights.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Journey?
cta.description: Join thousands of successful candidates who have improved their interview skills with our platform.

benefits.successSubtitle: Real feedback from developers who have transformed their careers
benefits.testimonial1: Career-Boost helped me prepare for my senior developer interview at Google. The AI-generated questions were incredibly realistic and helped me identify knowledge gaps.
benefits.testimonial2: I was able to land my dream product manager role thanks to the comprehensive interview practice. The explanations were particularly helpful.
benefits.testimonial3: The platform's personalized approach made all the difference. I felt confident and well-prepared for every technical question.

roi.title: Calculate Your Career ROI
roi.subtitle: See how interview preparation translates to career advancement and salary growth
roi.conclusion: Investing in proper interview preparation pays dividends throughout your career

finalCTA.subtitle: Join thousands of developers who have already improved their interview skills and landed better positions. Start your journey today.

urgency.title: Don't Miss Your Next Opportunity
urgency.description: Your dream job could be one interview away. Start preparing now and give yourself the competitive edge you need.

footer.description: Career-Boost helps developers and professionals excel in technical interviews with AI-powered practice questions, personalized feedback, and comprehensive preparation tools.
